"Hunter": "Hunter is a class that uses \"Guard\" and \"Step\" to evade enemy attacks and deal massive damage back to them with \"Counters\"."

"\"Massive Hunter\" is an Active Skill that reduces damage taken and nullifies knockback for a set time when used.

Register it to your Subpalette so you can use it when fighting powerful enemies."
"<yellow>\"Hunter Art Avenge\"<c> boosts the damage of any PA (Photon Art) if you get hit by an enemy attack at the moment that you use it."
